desc.en: The 162th track from Blue Archive, especially used during the story which Shiroko and Shiroko (Terror) reached an agreement.
desc.jp: The 162th track from Blue Archive, especially used during the story which Shiroko and Shiroko (Terror) reached an agreement.

desc.zh_cn: 蔚蓝档案OST中的第162首歌，尤其用于白子与黑白子达成共识的故事情节中。
desc.zh_tw: The 162th track from Blue Archive, especially used during the story which Shiroko and Shiroko (Terror) reached an agreement.

desc.en: The 7th track in Blue Archive, which is extremely popular and well-known due to the memes related to both the characters and stories.
desc.jp: The 7th track in Blue Archive, which is extremely popular and well-known due to the memes related to both the characters and stories.

desc.zh_cn: 蔚蓝档案OST中的第七首曲子，以其与人物及故事相关的梗和二创而相当热门和出名。
desc.zh_tw: The 7th track in Blue Archive, which is extremely popular and well-known due to the memes related to both the characters and stories.

desc.en: Most battle tracks have this characteristic. The general representation includes fast drums and featuring multiple elements in a short period of time.
desc.jp: Most battle tracks have this characteristic. The general representation includes fast drums and featuring multiple elements in a short period of time.
desc.thai: Most battle tracks have this characteristic. The general representation includes fast drums and featuring multiple elements in a short period of time.
desc.ko: Most battle tracks have this characteristic. The general representation includes fast drums and featuring multiple elements in a short period of time.
desc.zh_cn: 大部分战斗曲均具备此特性，一般的表现形式为鼓点快、元素偏多的情况。
desc.zh_tw: Most battle tracks have this characteristic. The general representation includes fast drums and featuring multiple elements in a short period of time.

desc.en: Example: FEEEEVER TIME, Undefined Behavior, Goal Wo Nerae! Overall it coincides with the Uplifting genre and combat tracks.

desc.zh_cn: 举例/联想：FEEEEVER TIME、Undefined Behavior、Goal Wo Nerae!；总体上基本与Uplifting的风格和战斗曲重合。
desc.zh_tw: Example: FEEEEVER TIME, Undefined Behavior, Goal Wo Nerae! Overall it coincides with the Uplifting genre and combat tracks.
